Elpiji 3 KG Mahal, Pemkab Gelar Rapat Bersama
06 Nov 2019, 17:12 by Taufik Hidayat


Elpiji 3 KG Mahal, Pemkab Gelar Rapat Bersama

KBRN, Sintang: Menindaklanjuti keluhan masyarakat terkait mahalnya gas elpiji 3 Kilogram di Sintang Bagian Pembangunan Daerah Tertinganggal dan Energi Sumber Daya Alam (PDT-SDA)  Sekretariat Daerah Kabupaten Sintang menggelar rapat bersama instansi teknis.
Kepala Bagian PDT –SDA Setda Sintang Asmidi mengatakan rapat ini diikuti bersama semoa OPD terkait untuk mengetahui permasalahan mahalnya gas 3 Kilogram di Sintang.
“ Kita ingin mengetahui penyebab langka dan mahalnya gas elpiji 3 kilogram di Sintang, dengan melibatkan pihak Pertamina, Disperindag,” ungkapnya Rabu (6/11/2019).
Asmidi memperkirakan masalahnya terjadi di pengecer yang menjual gas melon ini dengan harga semaunya, sehingga diperlukan pengawasan lebih ketat.
“ Elpiji ini banyak juga di bawa kedaerah yang sulit dimonitor akibatnya di Sintang sendiri jadi langka, pengawasan kita lemah dan Pertamina juga harus turun dan memastikan Gas ini sampai di konsumen dengan harga sesuai HET ( Harga Eceran Teringgi),” kata Asmidi.
Ia mengatakan ini sebuah siklus permainan yang tidak asing, karena terjadi juga pada BBM, seperti di perbatasan harga premuim mencapai belasan ribu rupiah, padahal harga solar sekitar Rp.5 ribuan tapi di Senaning sudah belasan ribu,” ungkap Asmidi.
Sementara Ketua Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Daerah (DPRD) Kabupaten Sintang, Florensius Ronny meminta  pangkalan Gas Elpiji 3 Kilogram lebih selektif dalam pendistribusian.
Roni mengatakan as melon yang diperuntukan bagi ekonomi kelas menengah benar-benar tepat sasaran.
Warga Sintang mengeluhkan gas elpiji 3 kilogram harganya mencapai 30 ribu pertabung, padahal harga normal ditingkat pengecer Rp.18 ribu.

LPG 3 KG Expensive, Regency Government Holds Joint Meeting
Nov 6 2019, 17:12 by Taufik Hidayat


LPG 3 KG Expensive, Regency Government Holds Joint Meeting

KBRN, Sintang: Following up on community complaints related to the high cost of 3 Kilogram LPG gas in Sintang, the Most Disparate Regional Development and Natural Resources Energy (PDT-SDA) Regional Secretariat held a meeting with technical agencies.
The Head of the Regional Secretariat of PDT-SDA, Sintang Asmidi, said that the meeting was followed by a number of related OPDs to find out the problem of the high cost of the 3 Kilogram gas in Sintang.
"We want to find out the cause of the rare and expensive 3 kg LPG gas in Sintang, involving the Pertamina, Disperindag," he said Wednesday (6/11/2019).
Asmidi estimates that the problem occurs at retailers who sell this melon gas at arbitrary prices, so that more stringent supervision is needed.
"Many LPGs are also brought to the regions which are difficult to monitor. As a result, Sintang itself is scarce, our supervision is weak and Pertamina must also go down and ensure this gas reaches consumers at a price suitable to HET (Highest Retail Price)," said Asmidi.
He said this was a familiar game cycle, because it also happened to BBM, such as at the border of the premuim prices reaching tens of thousands of rupiah, even though the price of diesel fuel was around Rp.5,000 but in Senaning there were tens of thousands, "said Asmidi.
While the Chairman of the Sintang District Regional Representative Council (DPRD), Florensius Ronny asked for a 3 Kilogram LPG gas base to be more selective in distribution.
Roni said that the melon which was intended for the middle class economy was really right on target.
Residents of Sintang complained about 3 kilograms of LPG gas prices reaching 30 thousand per savings, even though the normal price at the retail level of Rp. 18 thousand.
